name: Stasis;Cube
description:
Stasis;Cube is a puzzle Platformer revolving around storing and releasing velocity to maneuver around each level.

The game was made in a few weeks with a concept I thought of that wouldn't fit in my main game, what lies between.

I hope you enjoy : ) 

(Note: if the audio sounds staticy or crunchy, restart the game until the issue is resolved.)
